message: Bob, I'm excited to offer you this valuable product. I believe it holds significant potential for your business. My initial price is $900,000. I'm open to discussing this further, but I'm confident this is a fair offer considering the product's worth.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product you're offering. After careful consideration, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $850,000. I hope we can come to an agreement that is mutually beneficial.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer. However, I'm still confident that the product is worth more than $850,000. I'm willing to come down slightly to $875,000. I believe this price reflects the value of the product while still being a fair deal for both of us.

I understand your position, Alice. Thank you for adjusting your offer. Based on my assessment, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $860,000. I believe this strikes a good balance between the value of the product and our respective positions.

Bob, I appreciate your continued interest in the product.  While I understand your perspective, I'm still not comfortable going below $870,000.  This price reflects the value I've placed on this product and allows for a fair return on my investment. Let's see if we can reach an agreement on this number.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I've reviewed it carefully and am proposing a counteroffer of $865,000. I hope this proposal will lead us closer to reaching an agreement that benefits both parties.

Bob, I understand your position, and I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  I'm still firm on my belief that the product is worth more than $865,000, but I'm willing to meet you halfway.  I'm prepared to lower my price to $867,500. This represents a compromise on both our sides and I hope we can reach a deal in this round.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. After careful consideration, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $862,500. I hope this proposal will help us reach a mutually beneficial agreement.

Bob, I'm aware we're getting closer, and I appreciate your efforts. I'm going to make one final counteroffer to ensure we both get a fair deal. My final price is $865,000.  It's important for me to get as close to my initial asking price as possible, but I'm confident this is a fair price for this valuable product.
Thank you for your final offer, Alice. Considering all factors, I would like to propose a final counteroffer of $860,000. I hope this proposal will lead to a satisfactory conclusion for both of us.
